<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"获取日志流"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/get_log_stream/{id}"} context={"endpoint"} />

通过 id 获取指定日志流的配置。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"请求"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"要获取的日志流的 id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]} />

<RequestSchema title={"请求体"} body={undefined} />
